# TedT.org

> Personal website by Ted Tschopp covering technology, theology, creativity, and related projects.

Notes:

- Primary content is published as HTML pages; RSS/JSON feeds and Markdown ADRs are often the cleanest machine-readable sources.

## Key pages

- [Homepage](https://tedt.org/): Recent writing and featured sections.
- [Profile](https://tedt.org/profile/): Biography and key links.
- [AI Prompt Library](https://tedt.org/prompts/): Curated prompt collection.

## Feeds

- [RSS feed](https://tedt.org/rss.xml): Latest posts.
- [JSON feed](https://tedt.org/feed.json): Latest posts in JSON Feed format.

## Architecture / implementation notes (Markdown)

- [ADR index](https://tedt.org/docs/adr/0000-index.md): Architecture Decision Records (ADRs).
- [CI notes](https://tedt.org/docs/ci.md): Build/deploy notes.

## Optional

- [Sitemap](https://tedt.org/sitemap.xml): Full list of site URLs (large).
- [Source repository](https://github.com/TedTschopp/tedt.org): Markdown sources, scripts, and build config.
